typeProperties.tableName: <Name of the table in the Azure Table instance that linked service refers to

properties.linkedServiceName: <Name of the linked service that refers to an Azure Table.  This linked service must be of type: AzureStorage

availability.frequency: <Specifies the time unit for data slice production. Supported frequency:Minute, Hour, Day, Week, Month>
availability.interval: <Specifies the interval within the defined frequency. For example, frequency set to 'Hour' and interval set to 1 indicates that new data slices should be produced hourly>
